required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Phase 1 Study of DS-6051b in Japanese Subjects With Advanced Solid Malignant Tumors
clinical_study.official_title: Phase 1 Study of DS-6051b in Japanese Subjects With Advanced Solid Malignant Tumors Harboring Either a ROS1 or NTRK Fusion Gene

brief_summary.textblock: This is a Phase 1 study to evaluate the safety, tolerability, and pharmacokinetics of DS-6051b in Japanese subjects with advanced solid malignant tumors harboring either a ROS1 or NTRK fusion gene.

detailed_description.textblock: This study is single arm study with DS-6051b in approximately 9 subjects with advanced solid malignant tumors harboring either a ROS1 or NTRK fusion gene. Safety and tolerability, pharmacokinetics (PK), MTD/RP2D (maximum tolerated dose/recommended phase 2 dose) and preliminary efficacy of DS-6051b will be evaluated.

primary_outcome.measure: number and severity of adverse events
primary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 through 28 days after last dose
primary_outcome.description: number and severity of treatment emergent adverse events

secondary_outcome.description: Maximum concentration (Cmax), time to maximum plasma concentration (Tmax), area under the concentration-time curve (AUC) and CL/F for DS-6051a (a free base form of DS-6051b) will be assessed on Days 1 and 15 of Cycle 1.

Maximum concentration (Cmax), time to maximum plasma concentration (Tmax), area under the concentration-time curve (AUC) and CL/F for DS-6051a (a free base form of DS-6051b) will be assessed on Days 1 and 15 of Cycle 1.

Maximum concentration (Cmax), time to maximum plasma concentration (Tmax), area under the concentration-time curve (AUC) and CL/F for DS-6051a (a free base form of DS-6051b) will be assessed on Days 1 and 15 of Cycle 1.

Maximum concentration (Cmax), time to maximum plasma concentration (Tmax), area under the concentration-time curve (AUC) and CL/F for DS-6051a (a free base form of DS-6051b) will be assessed on Days 1 and 15 of Cycle 1.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with dose-limiting toxicities
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 21 days following the first dose of treatment
secondary_outcome.description: to determine maximum tolerated dose/recommended phase 2 dose

arm_group.description: Drug: DS-6051b 400 mg or 800 mg daily

intervention.description: Drug: DS-6051b 400 mg or 800 mg daily

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Advanced solid malignant tumors that are refractory to standard therapy or for which no standard therapy is available.
- An Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status (PS) 0-1.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Previously had or currently has any of the following diseases:
Cardiac failure (NYHA Functional Classification â‰¥ Class III), myocardial infarction, cerebral infarction, unstable angina, arrhythmia requiring treatment, coronary/peripheral artery disease, pulmonary thrombosis, uncontrolled deep vein thrombosis, clinically severe thromboembolic event, or autoimmune disease requiring treatment.
- Previously had or currently has clinically severe pulmonary disease (eg, interstitial pneumonia, pneumonitis, pulmonary fibrosis, radiation pneumonia).
- Severe or uncontrolled concomitant disease.
- Clinically active brain metastases or central nervous system tumor requiring steroid or anticonvulsant treatment.

facility.name: National Hospital Organization Kyushu Cancer Center
